name: The Cube Games
description:
Press ESC no matter what game you are in unless it has a main menu button to go to the main menu. It's a little weird in browser with fullscreen. There's also a download if you want the actual file.

Cube Soccer- WASD to move blue,  Arrow keys to move red.  Score in end walls. 1 goal wins.

Cube Runner.  A and D to move. later on W to fly. W to jump and double jump.

I hope you enjoy, and I plan to add more levels and games over time!
